description: This 2-sided, relief-shaded trail map and guide covers popular hiking, mountain biking and equestrian trails in Banff National Park as well as Egypt Lake, Shadow Lake and the Sawback Trail up through Mystic Pass. All the day hikes around the Banff townsite are featured as well as easy mountain bike outings and long rides such as Lake Minnewanka, Goat Creek Trail, and the Banff Trail-Rundle Riverside route from Canmore to Banff. On the back of the map is a larger scale inset of Mt. Assiniboine Provincial Park with in and out access routes plus a guide with descriptions and photos to recommended trails from day hikes and mountain bike rides to multi-day trips.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Banff  & Mt. Assiniboine
